body.h2: This page is a work in progress.
body.p: Above is (probably) a console, and below is possibly disfunctional or unstyled content. Whatever happens, things will not look right.

blockquote.p: There's some content in the boxes that need expanding or shortening, but other than that, it's just the music player now.
After that, and fixing the god damned webkit issues, the main page will be functionally complete, and I'll get to work on the blog.
